quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Fraser and South
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, timmy, drama. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is Timmys teacher in the animated TV series The Fairly OddParents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Denzel Crocker

questions.question: Are Elmer and Sanjay Timmys best friends on the show The Fairly OddParents?
Who does Timy Turner have a crush on in The Fairly OddParents?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trixie Tang

questions.question: In The Fairly OddParents, what is Timmy Turners alien friends name?
What is Ray Veechios job on the Due South TV series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A detective

questions.question: In an episode of the Canadian police drama Due South, Ray went to Canada to help Fraser.
Who is the woman that Fraser fell in love with and arrested after a long chase through the Due South police drama?
Which male character from The Fairly OddParents is somewhat obsessed with Timmy?
Who shot Fraser in the back as he tried to get on a train in an episode of Due South?
In the Due South TV series, the half-wolf companion to Fraser, Diefenbaker, is blind.
What is the name of the kitten that Tara adopts near the end of season 4 of the Buffy series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Miss Kitty Fantastico

questions.question: Which song does Giles, played by Anthony Stewart Head, sing during season 4 of Buffy the Vampire Slayer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: In The Fairly OddParents series, Rick is Timmys babysitter.
In the premiere episode of Due South, why did Fraser leave Canada for Chicago?

options.text: He wanted to find his fathers murderer
He didnt like the climate of Canada
He wanted to find his long-gone mother

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He wanted to find his fathers murderer

questions.question: On the show Due South, what is the name of the Canadian Mountie that leaves the Northwest territory to go Chicago?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Benton Fraser Jr.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Laurel and Hardy
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cartoon, cowabunga. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the TMNT episode Sky Turtles, who asked, Hey, Donatello, what happens when too much reverse gravity hits too much reverse gravity??
Michelangelo, one of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, was well known for which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: for his love of pizza

questions.question: Which villain that Leonardo confronts on the TMNT series comes from a video game?
In the final season of Due South, Ray went undercover for the mob.
Which was the only Laurel and Hardy film to win an Oscar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Music Box

questions.question: In the TMNT series, Leonardo was unable to do the ninja move, the Viper, for what reason?

options.text: Splinter never taught it to him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was afraid of snakes.

questions.question: In first season of Due South, was Fraser stabbed in the right leg?
On the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles cartoon series, Splinter had an ancestor by the name of Hamato Koji.
In the TMNT episode Cowabunga Shredhead Shredder ends up with which turtles personality?
What were the names of Stan and Ollies twin brothers in the Laurel and Hardy movie Our Relations?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bert and Alf

questions.question: What statement is true about Donatellos inventions on the TMNT cartoon?

options.text: They never have any practical use.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They often malfunction.

questions.question: In the TMNT episode Bebop and Rocksteady Conquer the Universe what do Bebop and Rocksteady do to the turtles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: make them afraid of everything

questions.question: Raphael, one of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, was known for which of the following?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: for his sarcasm and jokes

questions.question: Which of the four Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles wore the purple mask?
In Way Out West what part of the USA do Laurel and Hardy head off for into the sunset?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Laurel
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, laurel, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the TV series Roswell High, Sheriff Valenti wanted to arrest Max because he knew he was an alien.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: to put up an aerial

questions.question: Who becomes the fourth Alien in the last episode of the series Roswell High?
What was Laurel and Hardys first feature length comedy film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pardon Us

questions.question: In the TV series Roswell High, what was the last day the whole gang, including Tess, spent together?
In which Laurel and Hardy film was the phrase Heres Another Nice Mess Youve Gotten Me Into first used?

options.text: The Laurel and Hardy Murder Case

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Laurel and Hardy Murder Case

questions.question: In the Laurel and Hardy comedy short Brats there is a picture of this actress on the wall.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jean Harlow

questions.question: What is the surname of Isabel and Max in the TV series Roswell High?
In the TV series Roswell High, was Alex killed by Max?
Who is shot in the pilot episode of Roswell High?
What does Tess call her baby on the TV show Roswell High?
Which Laurel and Hardy film was the first black and white film to undergo film colorization?
What statement is true about Tess, one of the characters of the sci-fi series Roswell High?

options.text: She needs to return home with the three aliens and she must get pregnant with Maxs baby.
She is in Roswell to kill Alex.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She needs to return home with the three aliens and she must get pregnant with Maxs baby.

questions.question: What type of animal is Laughing Gravy?
How many short films and features did Laurel and Hardy appear in together?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Storytellers and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, kinks, def. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What member of the popular band The Kinks was featured in the first episode of Storytellers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ray Davies

questions.question: Did Liz and Max get married on the TV show Roswell High?
Who does Michael live with in the first episode of Roswell High?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His foster dad

questions.question: The actors, who play Michael and Isabel in Roswell High, were seen in what two other shows, respectively?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CSI: Miami and Greys Anatomy

questions.question: What Backstreet Boy guest starred in an episode of Roswell High?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Howie Dorough

questions.question: In 1998 crooner Tony Bennett hosted Storytellers and performed with what popular boy band?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Backstreet Boys

questions.question: Why did Max and Liz get jailed in an episode of Roswell High?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: robbing a convenience store

questions.question: Def Leppard has never appeared on VH1: Storytellers.
How many country artists were featured in the first 10 episodes of VH 1: Storytellers?
Who was Tess living with when she first met the gang in the TV series Roswell High?
This singer had over 20 top 50 hits as a solo artist and together with her former band mates. She appeared minus the band on Storytellers in 1998.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stevie Nicks

questions.question: Dave Matthews has been on Storytellers more than once.
Of the groups listed below which one did NOT appear on Storytellers?
When did VH1: Storytellers premier?
This former Beatle appeared on Storytellers in 1998.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ringo Starr

quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Supernatural and Series
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, fiction, expeditions. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On the TV show Supernatural, when the 66th seal is broken, Lucifer is released from Hell.
What episode of the science fiction series Andromeda features the following quote?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Under the Night

questions.question: How do the Winchester brothers finance their demon-hunting expeditions on the TV show Supernatural?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Criminal activities

questions.question: On the TV show Supernatural, when Sam and Dean were growing up, their father John Winchester trained them to be what?
For the first season of the TV show Supernatural, what is the underlying story line that connects the episodes into a cohesive whole?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Find father

questions.question: Who rescues Dean from Hell at the beginning of Season 4 of Supernatural?
What are the first names of the Winchester brothers on the TV show Supernatural?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dean and Sam

questions.question: What is the name of Tyrs wife in the TV series Andromeda?
What episode of the Andromeda series is the quote on the sound clip taken from?
On the TV show Supernatural, there is a particular firearm which has the capability of killing demons. What kind of firearm is this?
Listen to the quote and guess the name of the episode of the Andromeda TV series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: D Minus Zero

questions.question: In the TV series Supernatural, 66 seals need to be broken for Lucifer to be released from Hell. The first and last seals are actually people. Who are they?

options.text: The first seal was Dean Winchester, the last seal was the demon, Lilith.
The first seal was the angel Uriel, the last seal was the angel Azazel.
The first seal was John Winchester, the last seal was the demon, Ruby.
The first seal was Dean and Sams mother, the last seal was their father.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The first seal was Dean Winchester, the last seal was the demon, Lilith.

questions.question: What is the original hair colour of Andromeda series character Beka?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is not known

questions.question: To what substance was Sam Winchester addicted during the last half of season 4 of Supernatural?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Demon blood

questions.question: On the TV show Supernatural, Dean Winchesters most beloved possession is his automobile.  What kind of vehicle does he drive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chevrolet Impala
